ISSUE.TITLE: Issue after "BrowscapXmlHelper performance issue #1964"
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hi there. With the new UserAgentHelper changes there is a bug when UserAgent is not submitted in request. There will be a NullException on line 78 in UserAgentHelper.cs. My fix is line 78: return !string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(userAgent) && bowscapXmlHelper.IsCrawler(userAgent);
